review: Works good when the Wifi is good at 2.4 Gigahertz.  Not reliable it seems at 5 GHZ wifi lots of buffering, maybe a weak signal.
author: Michael E Krueger

review: easy-simple and great value for the dollar.
author: rob webb

review: The Fire stick has been awesome. Easy to use & worth the money!!!
author: Marilyn Wilson

review: I am totally addicted to this!
author: Shree Lafaye Ziller

review: Comparing to chromecast, this is way better than chromecast as it is superfast, slim, and sleek. Very good product
author: Dino Jameson

review: Great multimedia stick. Love it for my prime movies, netflix, prime photos, prime music, etc.
author: Kindle Customer

review: I rec'd as a Xmas gift and I have used it a lot.  There is still a somewhat limited selection for me as I am not into cartoons or horror movies/TV shows.  More documentary, history and current TV shows would be wonderful.  Also I was curious about the range of the stick.  My bedroom is on the other side of my living room wall where the wireless router is located.  I find I have to turn my bedroom TV  and pull the router closer in order to get consistent connection.
author: Linda R. Gierich

review: This is the best! I got a season pass for The Walking Dead Season 5 and watched all of the episodes on my big TV. I discovered what X-ray was when I checked the time on my Fire Phone or my Fire HD 7. X-ray was showing trivia and identifying the performers scene-by-scene. This was well worth the cost and I still plan to purchase the DVDs when they are available. I am a big fan of The Walking Dead, but there is so much more to watch using my Fire TV Stick!
author: Marta R. "Seans Mom"
